title: Figuring Out How To Love You

text=
A glimpse into how some people spend Valentine’s Day.

[[div class="text-container-wrap"]]
+++ loser nerd (bf)
[[div class="text-container"]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Why did you upload that. [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]] because [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]It wasn’t funny. We thought there was a cognitohazard or something infecting the text. [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]] please tell me your boss didn’t actually take “among us” and “penis exploded” seriously. i refuse to believe randall is that stupid[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] He DID and now he’s on my fucking ass for it, numbnuts. Fuck you.[[/span]]
[[/div]] 

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]] great way to start valentines lol[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]you ALWAYS do this! [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]always do what[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Always fucking. Always fucking[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]haha always fucking[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] certainly wish i was doing that to you rn[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] Let me type! I know you can see me doing that! And stop being corny![[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]] maybe i can’t. maybe i wont. maybe im using my android phone and your elitist “I went to MIT” Apple phone won’t play nice with me[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]This is your 217 number.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]damn, foiled again[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] Seriously. Fuck you. They’re making me do network checks again now, twice a week.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]] you needed the motivation anyway[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] I needed nothing! I needed nothing, babe![[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]] yeah you did. I know how you’ve been sitting in your office doing nothing all day[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] playing games on your phone[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]your email tab open with 1037 unread messages[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] Oh my god how did you know that[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]i walked into your office yesterday[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]do you not remember?[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]lashana?[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]hey. hey. do you seriously not remember?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] I do, and I don’t want to. it smells like bleach in there.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]bleach doesn’t have a smell[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]that’s caused by your office being dirty as hell[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]the bleach is reacting with sweat, humidity, mold, urea[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] Urea???? As in like pee??????[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]didn’t you contemplate peeing in your office once[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] ms “man guys are so lucky they can just pee in bottles”[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]God.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]what[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]That. That[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]That just makes me[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]] it makes you what[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Sorry. You were just the…first kind of guy like that I met. I remember that convo with a disturbing clarity.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]ha[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Didn’t you once offer to show me how badly that would work out with a snatch?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]tbh you can still do it if you’re not a coward[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] Gross.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]miss doesn’t get out of her office[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Hey.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]if all you’re traveling to is the restroom we need to get out more[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] the both of us[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Ugh…but I don’t want to.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]c’mon[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]No. It…It takes a lot of energy. I’m tired.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]you’re always tired[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]I know.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]so let it be my treat[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Ughhhhhhhhhhh[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]my treattttttttttt[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]for real tho lets do something for valentines[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] trip to…?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]NOLA.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]miami. i hate the smell of new orleans[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Oh, but my office is tolerable?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]because you’re there yes. if im gonna be smelling someone’s body odor it might as well be yours[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]](please bathe more pls pls pls)[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]I am trying to remember.[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] I appreciate the cologne you put on my desk yesterday, by the way. I saw that.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]hehe[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Can we go to Cincinnati?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]done deal. how soon can you take off[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]I’ll make Randall give me as soon as this afternoon. Fuck these stupid ass computers.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]right on that honestly. you should see the shit qureishi is making me do[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]What? Did something happen again?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]nah im just rerouting flesh mech logistics for the thirteenth time this month. you know much i wish site-delta would stop producing these things[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] anyways [[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] will you need help packing?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Maybe.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]will you need me to remind you of what to bring?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Probably.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]do you want my help?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Apologize for the document first. Please. That really scared me.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]im sorry. i wont do it again[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]i just wanted to get your attention.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]And you succeeded. So I feel like I’m rewarding bad behavior.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]not at all sweetie[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]after all[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] i wouldn’t want to upset you.[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] really[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] i mean that[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] i hate seeing you cry[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] i wish things were easier for you[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] hey, wait[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]you still there?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] I am. Sorry, got distracted. You make me so…[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]] You’re such a sap.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]haha, get ready already. i wanna wake up in a soft hotel bed with you tomorrow[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] I love you, Orion.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]and i love you too babe. i always will.[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]❤️[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
